gw.plugin.integration

Interface IIntegrationConfigSourcePlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface IIntegrationConfigSourcePlugin
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    The IIntegrationConfigSourcePlugin interface allows for a pluggable source for JSON Schema, Integration Mapping, Integration Filter, and Swagger Schema sources, as well as for publishing additional APIs at runtime, including APIs defined in Swagger Schemas produced by this plugin. Configuration sources produced by this plugin will be treated, for most purposes, exactly the same as configuration files on disk: they'll go through the same parsing, validation, and so forth. The sources will also be cached after they've been loaded once, but those caches will be cleared and the sources re-loaded in development environments if any integration configuration files are changed on disk, if classes are hotswapped, or if this plugin explicitly triggers the change callback. Multiple instances of this plugin can be registered under different names, and all such instances will be used at runtime. Plugin instances will always be checked for schema sources before the file system, such that plugins can effectively "shadow" configuration files, but if there are multiple plugins registered, the order in which they will be used is currently undefined, so if multiple plugins are installed they must be configured such there are not two plugins that attempt to produce different sources for the same logical name.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getFilterSource(java.lang.String fullyQualifiedName)
      Returns the source of the given integration filter, if the plugin manages that filter, and null if this plugin instance does not produce a filter with that name.
      java.lang.String getJsonSchemaSource(java.lang.String fullyQualifiedName)
      Returns the source of the given JSON Schema, if the plugin manages that schema, and null if this plugin instance does not produce a schema with that name.
      java.lang.String getMappingSource(java.lang.String fullyQualifiedName)
      Returns the source of the given integration mapping, if the plugin manages that mapping, and null if this plugin instance does not produce a mapping with that name.
      java.lang.String getPublishedApisAdditions()
      Returns configuration source in the same format as published-apis.yaml, which will be merged with the published-apis.yaml file in the configuration folder, or null if this plugin does not wish to publish any additional APIs.
      java.lang.String getSwaggerSchemaSource(java.lang.String fullyQualifiedName)
      Returns the source of the given Swagger schema, if the plugin manages that schema, and null if this plugin instance does not produce a schema with that name.
      boolean hasSwaggerSchemaSource(java.lang.String fullyQualifiedName)
      Returns true if this plugin will produce a swagger schema with the given name, and false otherwise
      void registerChangeCallback(ConfigSourceChangeCallback callback)
      Registers a callback that can be used by the plugin to indicate that configuration sources have changed and the caches should be reloaded.

    • Method Detail

      • getJsonSchemaSource

        java.lang.String getJsonSchemaSource(java.lang.String fullyQualifiedName)
        Returns the source of the given JSON Schema, if the plugin manages that schema, and null if this plugin instance does not produce a schema with that name.
        Parameters:
        fullyQualifiedName - the fully-qualified name of the schema, such as ext.plugin.admin-1.0
        Returns:
        the source for the named JSON Schema, or null if this plugin instance does not produce that schema

      • getMappingSource

        java.lang.String getMappingSource(java.lang.String fullyQualifiedName)
        Returns the source of the given integration mapping, if the plugin manages that mapping, and null if this plugin instance does not produce a mapping with that name.
        Parameters:
        fullyQualifiedName - the fully-qualified name of the mapping, such as ext.plugin.admin-1.0
        Returns:
        the source for the named integration mapping, or null if this plugin instance does not produce that mapping

      • getSwaggerSchemaSource

        java.lang.String getSwaggerSchemaSource(java.lang.String fullyQualifiedName)
        Returns the source of the given Swagger schema, if the plugin manages that schema, and null if this plugin instance does not produce a schema with that name.
        Parameters:
        fullyQualifiedName - the fully-qualified name of the schema, such as ext.plugin.admin-1.0
        Returns:
        the source for the named Swagger schema, or null if this plugin instance does not produce that schema

      • hasSwaggerSchemaSource

        boolean hasSwaggerSchemaSource(java.lang.String fullyQualifiedName)
        Returns true if this plugin will produce a swagger schema with the given name, and false otherwise
        Parameters:
        fullyQualifiedName - the fully-qualified name of the schema, such as ext.plugin.admin-1.0
        Returns:
        true if this plugin can produce the given schema, false otherwise

      • getFilterSource

        java.lang.String getFilterSource(java.lang.String fullyQualifiedName)
        Returns the source of the given integration filter, if the plugin manages that filter, and null if this plugin instance does not produce a filter with that name.
        Parameters:
        fullyQualifiedName - the fully-qualified name of the filter, such as ext.plugin.admin_all-1.0
        Returns:
        the source for the named filter, or null if this plugin instance does not produce that filter

      • getPublishedApisAdditions

        java.lang.String getPublishedApisAdditions()
        Returns configuration source in the same format as published-apis.yaml, which will be merged with the published-apis.yaml file in the configuration folder, or null if this plugin does not wish to publish any additional APIs.
        Returns:
        the source for additional published-apis configuration, or null

      • registerChangeCallback

        void registerChangeCallback(ConfigSourceChangeCallback callback)
        Registers a callback that can be used by the plugin to indicate that configuration sources have changed and the caches should be reloaded. Currently, reloading of schemas is only triggered by REST API requests, and only when the server is running in "dev" mode (i.e. -Dgw.server.mode=dev).
        Parameters:
        callback - the callback to invoke when configuration sources have changed
